attributes.action: immediately hand over the reins of power to Bob Ainsworth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since coming to power in 1997 Nu-Labour has NEVER had an elected representative with the testicular strength nor probity to speak the truth.  Bob Ainsworth has broken the mould and has spoken the truth.  It is only right, therefore, as the ONLY honest member of our government, THAT HE SHOULD BE IN CHARGE OF IT.
